sentences.en: After a battle Your faithfull companions will equip loot.
sentences.cn: 在一场您娜菲斯福尔同伴将装备掠夺.

sentences.en: ERROR: >> Loaded 0 loot definitions. DB table'item _ loot _ template'is empty.
sentences.cn: 这个错误. 看了下这个表. 是空的要怎么解决呢?

sentences.en: He is the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他就是那个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.

sentences.en: He liked the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢这个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.
这是外快, 是 么 ?

sentences.en: It was all the loot taken by soldiers from the captured town.
sentences.cn: 这就是士兵们从被占领的城镇掠夺来的所有东西.

sentences.en: It was Arakanese who joined the general scramble for loot.
sentences.cn: 阿拉干参与了对战利品的全面掠夺.

sentences.en: Most criminals steal in order to sell their loot for cash on the black market.
sentences.cn: 罪犯盗窃大多是为了把赃物在黑市上卖掉，换取现金。

sentences.en: The oil best calculated to lubricate the political machine was the loot that it received.
sentences.cn: 这部政治机器最好的润滑油,是它的非法收入.

sentences.en: The thief outwitted the police and got away with his loot.
sentences.cn: 小偷以狡计骗过警察带着赃物逃跑了.

sentences.en: The thieves quarreled with one another about how to divide the loot.
sentences.cn: 盗贼们为了如何分脏而彼此争吵起来.

sentences.en: The thieves were caught with their loot by the police.
sentences.cn: 警察抓获了小偷及其赃物.

sentences.en: There have been reports of youths taking advantage of the general confusion to loot and steal.
sentences.cn: 有报道说一些年轻人乘局势一片混乱之际抢劫盗窃。

sentences.en: There was a rift within the loot, as Albert Tennyson says.
sentences.cn: 正如艾伯特·丁尼生所说的,投机倒把里出现了裂罅.

sentences.en: This was the island where buccaneers hid their loot.
sentences.cn: 这是过去海盗们藏赃物的岛屿.

trans.tran_cn: 掠夺物，战利品，（官吏的）赃物，非法收入，抢劫，外快
trans.tran_en: goods taken by soldiers from a place where they have won a battle

trans.tran_cn: 掠夺, 抢劫, 劫掠
trans.tran_en: to steal things, especially from shops or homes that have been damaged in a war or  riot
